links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
prog: (PARI) default(realprecision,1000); contfrac((exp(1))^4)(PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(exp(1)^4); for (n=0, 20000, write("b058283.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 22 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A092426 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 22 2009
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
extensions: More terms from _R. K. Guy_, Jun 15 2001
